export function clearSessionStorage(){cSS(substring_sessionStorage);}function cSS(substring){var sessionStorage_Keys=[];for(var i=0;i<sessionStorage.length;i++){sessionStorage_Keys.push(sessionStorage.key(i));}for(var _i=0,_sessionStorage_Keys=sessionStorage_Keys;_i<_sessionStorage_Keys.length;_i++){var key=_sessionStorage_Keys[_i];if(key.includes(substring)){sessionStorage.removeItem(key);}}}//____________________CreateObjects____________________
export var createPlayer=function createPlayer(name,alias,color){return{Name:name,Alias:alias,Color:color,Wins:0};};export var createAttributes=function createAttributes(columns){return{Columns:columns,InputType:3,LastPlayed:new Date(),CreatedDate:new Date()};};export var createFinalScoreElement=function createFinalScoreElement(attributes,surrender,list_winner){var finalScore={Played:new Date(),Columns:attributes.Columns,Surrender:surrender,List_Winner:list_winner};return finalScore;};export var formatDate=function formatDate(date){var d=new Date(date);var day=d.getDate();var month=d.getMonth()+1;var year=d.getFullYear();var formattedDay=day<10?"0".concat(day):"".concat(day);var formattedMonth=month<10?"0".concat(month):"".concat(month);return"".concat(formattedDay,".").concat(formattedMonth,".").concat(year);};
